Posts.Content: May 18, 2009 06:46AM stingbw99 wrote: My drain was pulled out last week also and I know I have fluid retention.  The nurse said when she pulled it that if it fills they would probably have to asperate it but I have a tissue expander in and don't need them to puncture it.  I see my PS tomorrow for the first pump-up of my tissue expander and I am concerned about the fluid and pain from the fluid build up and also from the incision site.  I noticed this past Friday that there was some oozing from part of my incision and that tells me it is not healed enough to start stretching the skin.  Sometimes I feel like my PS doesn't feel that what I have to say is important.  I hope he will listen and give me another prescription for pain meds cuz this is bothering me.  When do you feel that you can wear a bra again?  I feel so terrified to even put the camasol on that they gave me?  Thanks for listening.
Posts.Title: still hurts after drains out? freckles69 pshelton
